fields.description:

	at org.osgi.util.tracker.BundleTracker.open(BundleTracker.java:163)

comments.body: I have a patch for this, it appears that the event on removingBundle will be null when a tracker is closed. We didn't cope with this and falsely assumed a tracker was opened. I've attached a patch for review. I want to run some testing before I commit it down, but thought I would attach a patch so people could review.
